jobDescription: If you eat, sleep and breathe data, our data analytics position may be for you. At Buxton, we’re passionate about data and the ways it can help change the lives of our clients. Our analysts are responsible for data mining and business intelligence. In this role, you will conduct advanced analyses, custom reporting/dashboards, and standardize all data used for developing client solutions. We’re looking for a natural and innovative problem solver who can’t stop their curious mind and has a desire to dig deep for insights that answer our client’s business questions.
